subtitleNullable: Reviews and General Sentiment among Customers
descriptionNullable:
This dataset was scrapped by the SkyTrax site: https://www.airlinequality.com/airline-reviews/british-airways.

It contains 2 .cvs files:

1. `reviews_data1.csv`: This is a collection of reviews text along with the `Recommended` column (is the company recommended by the user? YES or NO) and the `Verified` column (if the travel is verified. YES or NO)

2. `ratings_data.csv`: This is a collection of rate points.

## Data Dictionary
` reviews_data1.csv`
1) Verified: YES or NO
2) Reviews: content of the review
3) Recommended: YES or NO

`ratings_data.csv`
1) Aircraft: Type of aircraft.
2) Type Of Traveler:
                                - Couple Leisure
                                - Solo Leisure
                                - Business
                                - Family Leisure
3) Seat Type:
                      - Economy Class
                      - Business Class
                      - Premium Economy
                      - First Class
4) Route: Flight route
5) Date Flown: Date of the travel
6) Seat Confort: 1 to 5 stars
7) Cabin Staff: 1 to 5 Stars
8) Food & Beverages: 1 to 5 stars
9) Inflight Entertainment: 1 to 5 stars
10) Ground Service: 1 to 5 stars
11) Wifi & Connectivity: 1 to 5 stars
12) Value For Money: 1 to 5 stars
13) Recommended: YES or NO

## Possible use
Sentiment analysis on reviews to understand which words come from texts.
Analysis of ratings to understand which feature contributes more to the recommendation.
